external_references.description: Jazi, H. (2021, April 19). Lazarus APT conceals malicious code within BMP image to drop its RAT . Retrieved September 29, 2021.
Park, S. (2021, June 15). Andariel evolves to target South Korea with ransomware. Retrieved September 29, 2021.

description: [Andariel](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0138) has hidden malicious executables within PNG files.(Citation: MalwareBytes Lazarus-Andariel Conceals Code April 2021)(Citation: Kaspersky Andariel Ransomware June 2021)
